CustomField.description: Field used in reports to know the Canal codes
CustomField.formula: IF(AV_IndicadorR2B__c = 'S','R2B', IF( ISPICKVAL(AV_Canal__c , '010010000') , 'Oficina', IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(AV_Canal__c , '020030010'), ISPICKVAL(AV_Canal__c , '020030040'), ISPICKVAL(AV_Canal__c , '020040020')), 'Now', IF( ISPICKVAL(AV_Canal__c , '030020070'), 'ImaginBank', 'Otros'))))
CustomField.label: CÃ³digo Canal
